email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax, LOA 250m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, $50.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Would you consider $49.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel's draft and speed? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. The vessel's draft is 14.5m and speed is 14.5 knots. I can lower the freight rate to $50.00 per metric ton, but $49.75 is too low. Let me know if this works. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the laycan of 15-20 October. Could you send over the charter party agreement? Also, what are the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if you need any further clarifications. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. The demurrage terms are acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement and everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent. I’ll mark the vessel as fixed and send you the finalized agreement shortly. Thanks for your cooperation and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
